required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Study of Propranolol Combined With Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy in Gastric Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of Propranolol Combined With Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy in Stage III-IV Gastric Cancer: an Open-lable, Single-arm Study

collaborator.agency: Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

brief_summary.textblock: At the cellular and animal level, we found that propranolol can inhibit the proliferation and invasion of gastric cancer cells. Further, we want to explore the efficacy and safety of propranolol in the treatment of gastric cancer patients.

intervention.description: add propranolol in gastric cancer patients who need to receive preoperate chemotherapy
